snippet: In what is shaping up to be the new top rivalry in tennis, Novak Djokovic held off Andy Murray on Wednesday at the ATP finals in London.
abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats Andy Murray at the ATP finals tennis tournament in London.
lead_paragraph: In what is shaping up to be the new top rivalry in tennis, Novak Djokovic held off Andy Murray on Wednesday at the ATP finals in London.

headline.main: Djokovic Tops Murray in Three Sets
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Tops Murray in Three Sets
